enWisdom: Forbearance is [like] a tribe [as it protects those who belong to it]
Forbearance is the ornament of [one’s] character
Forbearance is the symbol of excellence
Forbearance is the system by which the affairs of a believer are organized
Forbearance is one of the two excellent traits
The most modest among you are the most forbearing among you
The most beautiful qualities are forbearance and chastity

Wisdom: أَقْوَى النَّاسِ مَنْ قَوِيَ عَلَى غَضَبِهِ بِحِلْمِهِ
enWisdom: The strongest of all people is the one who overcomes his anger with his forbearance

Wisdom: أَشْجَعُ النَّاسِ مَنْ غَلَبَ الْجَهْلَ بِالْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: The most courageous of people is the one who defeats ignorance with forbearance
Verily the best of characteristics of men is forbearance

Wisdom: إِذَا حَلُمْتَ عَنِ السَّفِيهِ غَمَّمْتَهُ فَزِدْهُ غَمّاً بِحِلْمِكَ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: When you are forbearing with a foolish person, you sadden him; so increase his sorrow by your forbearance towards him

Wisdom: إِذَا أَحَبَّ اللَّهُ عَبْداً زَيَّنَهُ بِالسَّكِينَةِ وَالْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: When Allah loves a servant, He adorns him with tranquillity and forbearing

Wisdom: إِذَا حَلُمْتَ عَنِ الْجَاهِلِ فَقَدْ أَوْسَعْتَهُ جَوَاباً
enWisdom: When you are forbearing with an ignorant person, you have given him the best reply
The beauty of a man is his clemency
Fighting anger with forbearance is evidence of nobility

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ إِنْ أُغْضِبَ حَلُمَ وَإِنْ ظُلِمَ غَفَرَ وَإِنْ أُسِي‏ءَ إِلَيْهِ أَحْسَنَ
enWisdom: The best person is he who shows forbearance if he is angered, forgives if he is oppressed, and does good [in return] if is wronged
Counter anger with forbearance
Espouse forbearance for indeed it is a pleasing characteristic

Wisdom: قُوَّةُ الْحِلْمِ عِنْدَ الْغَضَبِ أَفْضَلُ مِنَ الْقُوَّةِ عَلَى الِانْتِقَامِ
enWisdom: The strength [required] for forbearance in times of anger is greater than the strength [needed] for vengeance

Wisdom: كُنْ حَلِيماً فِي الْغَضَبِ صَبُوراً فِي الرَّهَبِ مُجْمِلًا فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: Be forbearing in [times of] anger, very patient [and courageous] in fear, [and] moderate in your request

Wisdom: لَيْسَ الْخَيْرُ أَنْ يَكْثُرَ مَالُكَ وَوَلَدُكَ إِنَّمَا الْخَيْرُ أَنْ يَكْثُرَ عِلْمُكَ وَيَعْظُمَ حِلْمُكَ
enWisdom: Goodness is not in having more wealth and children, rather goodness is only in possessing more knowledge and greater forbearance

Wisdom: مَنْ غَاظَكَ بِقُبْحِ السَّفَهِ عَلَيْكَ فَغِظْهُ بِحُسْنِ الْحِلْمِ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: Whoever infuriates you by the ugliness of his foolish behaviour towards you, then infuriate him by the beauty of your forbearance towards him

Wisdom: وَإِنْ جَهِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ جَاهِلٌ فَلْيَسَعْهُ حِلْمُكُمْ
enWisdom: If an ignorant person acts ignorantly towards you then let your forbearance prevail over him
There is no virtue like forbearance
There is no supporter like forbearance
There is no honour higher than forbearance

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي خُلُقٍ لَا يَزِينُهُ حِلْمٌ
enWisdom: There is no good in a character that is not adorned with forbearance
The dimwit does not know the right of the wise one

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الْحِلْمُ كَظْمُ الْغَيْظِ وَمِلْكُ النَّفْسِ
enWisdom: Verily forbearance is only suppression of anger and self-restraint

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الْحَلِيمُ مَنْ إِذَا أُوذِيَ صَبَرَ وَإِذَا ظُلِمَ غَفَرَ
enWisdom: Indeed only he is forbearing who is patient when he is offended and forgives when he is wronged
The forbearing one is recognized by his increased tolerance

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْحِلْمِ كَظْمُ الْغَيْظِ وَمِلْكُ النَّفْسِ مَعَ الْقُدْرَةِ
enWisdom: The best forbearance is suppressing anger and exercising self-restraint despite having power [to exact revenge]
